title: What is likely to occur as technology advances? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the future, technology will create a world where social welfare is inevitable. One day, the majority of work will be automated away by AI and Robots. Life will take on a different meaning when we no longer struggle for survival but instead struggle to understand the meaning of life. After all, if you don’t need to worry about food and predators what should you focus on? In this future, the government will not only provide traditional welfare such as food and financial support but will also distribute work rations so that everyone can have a chance to experience an instinctual real life. Work will not be seen as labor but as a means to feel some semblance of productive purpose in life. When you struggle to cope with the meaning of life your government-appointed therapist will prescribe labor therapy. Here are my additional thoughts on how technology inevitably leads to a social welfare system and what it could look like → Social Welfare is Inevitable

The same thing that has always happened when technology advance. Longer life expectancy. More play time and less work time. More lethal weapons in war. And more ways to manipulate people through propaganda. These are some of the things that will most likely happen cause if history has taught us anything, it is that human nature doesn’t change.
